on

column7:
battery

value: 0

description:
out of battery / almost out of battery / running low on battery / still has some battery left / almost full of battery / full of battery
layer:1

OnValue:0
set(on, 0)

column8:
*source of light
description: lighting things around

column6:
$ turn on
set(on, 1)
enable(source of light)
enable(battery)
column7:
$ turn off
set(on, 0)
disable(source of light)
disable(battery)
column8:
$ charge
check(battery, not empty)
add(battery, ! battery>charge)
destroy(! battery)
column9:
$ empty
check(battery, empty)
createItem(battery)
set(! battery>charge, battery)

column6:
$ put
check(!p flashlight>battery, not empty)
add(!p flashlight>battery, charge)
destroy

column7:
$ equip
transferTo(! player. ANY max items)
